mapper.insert: insert into total_train( start_end_time, total_number, actual_number, average_number, train_duration, u_id) values ( #{start_end_time}, #{total_number}, #{actual_number}, #{average_number}, #{train_duration}, #{u_id})
insert into action_value( av_set, av_yes, av_average, at_id, st_tt_id, u_id) values ( #{av_set}, #{av_yes}, #{av_average}, #{at_id}, #{st_tt_id}, #{u_id})
insert into student_train( start_end_time, train_duration, tt_id, u_id) values ( #{start_end_time}, #{train_duration}, #{tt_id}, #{u_id})

insert into st_train_detailed( std_id, std_speed, std_frequency, std_Melody, std_Fluency, std_Power, at_id, st_id) values ( #{std_id}, #{std_speed}, #{std_frequency}, #{std_Melody}, #{std_Fluency}, #{std_Power}, #{at_id}, #{st_id})
